Welcome to dantalian’s Users Guide!

dantalian provides several tiers of features and abstraction, so in order to explain how to use it, this guide is split into the relevant sections listed below.

  • Installation
    • Dependencies
  • Quickstart Guide
  • Hard Links Tutorial
  • Libraries
    • Usage
    • Specific Requirements
    • Name conflicts
    • Tagging Directories
    • Moving Libraries
    • Nested Libraries
    • Scalability
  • FUSE
    • Usage
    • Nodes and virtual space
    • Name conflicts
    • Socket Operations
    • FUSE Operations
  • Bugs
    • Reporting Bugs
    • Known Bugs
